name: Piggy Wiggle Butt
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Aggressive
text: As a bonus action, Piggy Wiggle Butt can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Clay Jug
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

description: Source: The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy p. 28
